review: Omg! Love this thing :) what did I ever do without it.

review: It was easy to install and it works well. I can now watch streaming video from multiple sources.
author: Natty Bumpo

review: So far the fire stick has been easy to use, download apps and watch movies and TV shows. I definitely recommend the fire stick.
author: Todd Yeats

review: WORKS AS WELL AS THE REGULAR FIRE TV.
author: me

review: Better than expected and so easy to use.
author: Amazon Customer

review: When operational I'm overjoyed. I haven't called support yet but it has "locked up" on me more than once.
author: Dave in Roanoke

review: From the moment that I saw the commercial for the Fire Stick, I was sold.I received it and installed it effortlessly!I am also a Prime member, so watching movies on my flat screen versus my Kindle is a great improvement...Thx all you techies for another brilliant idea!
author: Madeline

review: Luv that is was easy to set up and understand
author: Tancy Winchell

review: Works well. some cool features. Worth the money if you don't have a smart tv
